sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. 2. Add cumin seeds and cook until they start to splutter. 3. Add chopped onion, minced garlic, minced ginger, and chopped green chili. Cook until onions are translucent. 4. Stir in chopped tomato and cook until soft. 5. Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, and garam masala. Cook for 2-3 minutes. 6. Add cubed potatoes and cauliflower florets. Stir to combine. 7. Cover and cook for 15-20 minutes, until vegetables are tender. 8. Season with salt and pepper. 9. Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with rice or roti.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Indian">8f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afcf</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Potatoes (2, cubed), Cauliflower (1/2 he</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Aloo Gobi</name> <nutrition>Calories: 250, Protein: 10g, Fat: 10g, Carbs: 35g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Cube potatoes and cut cauliflower into florets. 2. Chop onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, and green chili.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7c91d71f9795021069a3b6fce053af69</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
